full_summary:
### Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger Tender - D25, B7, H8

**Tender Information**
================================================
**Reference Number**: PW-_MCT-045-6250
**Amendment Number**: 2
**Solicitation Number**: W6898-230602/A
**Publication Date**: August 31, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: October 6, 2022 at 1:00:00 PM
**Expected Contract Start Date**: None
**Expected Contract End Date**: None
**Tender Status**: Expired

**Procurement Details**
---------------------
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Competitive Procurement Strategy**: Lowest/Lower Bid
* **Nature of Requirements**: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), requires the supply and delivery of Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger at 5th Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown, buildings D25,B7, and H8, located in Oromocto, New Brunswick.
* **Delivery Dates**: All items must be delivered on or before March 31, 2023.

**Contact Information**
------------------
* **Contracting Authority**: MacFarlane (MCT), Andrew
* **Contact Information**: (782) 377-4248 (direct) / (506) 851-6759 (fax)
* **Email Address**: andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Address**: 1045 Main Street, Moncton, New Brunswick, E1C 1H1

**Instructions for Bidders**
-------------------------
* Please note that this solicitation is being tested as part of PSPC’s Contract Modernization Initiative. For more information, please consult the brochure or visit the Canadian Government website at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca).
* Bidders are strongly encouraged to submit electronic bids, using the epost Connect service or facsimile, instead of mailing or hand-delivering their bids to the Moncton Bid Receiving Unit.
* If hand delivery is unavoidable, please use the on-site bid drop box available at the Moncton Bid Receiving Unit.

**Document Retrieval**
------------------
* All bid documents are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca).
* Supplement
